title: If I am super in the lead what is a good damage item on Garen besides Black Cleaver?
body:
So I wreaked top and could basically 1v3 and I had pretty much a full build but one slot left and I honestly couldn't think of an item to build that would fit what I already had. 

BC > Thorn > Spirit Visage > Deadmans > Boots not in that order but I wasn't sure what to fill with the 6th slot. Just pure damage with IE? Or maybe deaths dance?
